description.original: Provides a button and command to obfuscate onscreen text for better privacy in public settings.
description.translation: Provides a button and command to obfuscate onscreen text for better privacy in public settings.

dict.name: \"Privacy Glasses - hide files in: name: "Privacy Glasses - hide files in folders marked as private"
dict.name: \"Privacy Glasses - reveal headlin: name: "Privacy Glasses - reveal headlines only, keeping body content hidden"
dict.name: \"Privacy Glasses - do not hide an: name: "Privacy Glasses - do not hide anything"
dict.text: \": documentation, report issues,: text: ": documentation, report issues, contact info"
dict.text: 'To activate/deactivate Privacy Gl: text: 'To activate/deactivate Privacy Glasses, click the glasses icon on the left-hand ribbon or run "Privacy Glasses" commands in the Command Palette (Ctrl-P). The command can also be bound to a keyboard shortcut if you wish.'
dict..setDesc(\"Indicates whether the plugin: .setDesc("Indicates whether the plugin is automatically activated when starting Obsidian.")
dict..setDesc(\"Inactivity time after which P: .setDesc("Inactivity time after which Privacy Glasses will hide all. -1 to disable auto-hiding.")
dict..setDesc(\"Indicates whether or not to r: .setDesc("Indicates whether or not to reveal content when hovering the cursor over it.")
.setDesc("Indicates whether or not to reveal content when caret is on it.")
dict..setDesc(\"Comma-separated list of direc: .setDesc("Comma-separated list of directories, in which files are considered private")
dict..setDesc(\"Start a note with this text t: .setDesc("Start a note with this text to mark note as private")
